name: 電腦科學教育導論
description: This course introduces evidenced-based guidelines on how to create efficient instructional environments which result in faster and better learning.
goals: 了解電腦科學本質及學習電腦科學之目的
瞭解各國電腦課程設計理念及內涵
瞭解電腦科學教學理論、教學方法、及教學工具
瞭解最新之電腦科學教育趨勢
體認電腦科學在基礎教育之必要性
syllabus:
1.  **Overview of this course**
2.  **The Nature of Computer Science**
3.  **Why Teaching Computer Science?**
4.  **Curriculum (I): Taiwan K-9 Computing Curriculum**
5.  **Curriculum (II): Taiwan High School Computing Curriculum**
6.  **Curriculum (III): CSTA K–12 Computer Science Standards**
7.  **Curriculum (IV): National Curriculum in England**
8.  **Curriculum (V): The trends of Computing Curriculum**
9.  **Midterm exam**
10.  **New concepts in computer science education (I): Computer science unplugged**
11.  **New concepts in computer science education (II): Problem solving**
12.  **Computational thinking (I): Abstraction, pattern recognition, pattern generalization, and data representation**
13.  **Computational thinking (II): Algorithmic thinking, modelling, simulation**
14.  **Programming instruction (I): Theories**
15.  **Programming instruction (II): Tools**
16.  **Assessment (I)**
17.  **Assessment (II)**
18.  **Final report**

methodologies.note: 探索課程議題並提出解法
使用電腦科學教學工具

grading.note: 完成單元作業與期刊論文閱讀報告
期末針對各組研究主題報告
